title: The Geneva Bible: 1560 Edition
description: Original translation. Original commentary. Original illustrations. If you are looking for one of the most original Bibles―this is it! Get the first English Bible ever to be translated from the original languages of Greek and Hebrew. This is a facsimile of the Geneva Bible, which means you get an exact copy of the original (including margin notes from the translators!). Use this Bible as your main translation, next to another version, or simply as a must-have keepsake from Christian history!The Geneva Bible was a monumental achievement in the history of Protestant Bible translation. Born in a time of religious and political upheaval it helped foster Scripture literacy among the common people of England and offered for the first time “study resources” to make the Bible easier to understand.Features that made this Bible revolutionary then and still makes it valuable Features that make this particular version of the Geneva Bible a top Enjoy seeing original illustrations from the Geneva Bible! Not all modern Bibles include illustrations yet the Geneva Bible of 1560 did. It was created so both the common people and church leaders could deepen their understanding of the Bible―and included labeled diagrams and maps!Fascinating facts about the Geneva
